sn48.4:1.4: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako imesam pancannam indriyanam assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam viditva anupadavimutto hoti—
sn48.4:1.5: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araham khinasavo vusitava katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto”ti.
